name: SKPaymentDiscount
desc: The signed discount applied to a payment.

items.name: init(identifier: String, keyIdentifier: String, nonce: UUID, signature: String, timestamp: NSNumber)
items.desc: Initializes the payment discount with a signature and the parameters used by the signature.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A string used to uniquely identify a discount offer for a product.

items.name: var keyIdentifier: String
items.desc: A string that identifies the key used to generate the signature.

items.name: var nonce: UUID
items.desc: A universally unique ID (UUID) value that you define.

items.name: var signature: String
items.desc: A string representing the properties of a specific promotional offer, cryptographically signed.

items.name: var timestamp: NSNumber
items.desc: The date and time of the signature's creation in milliseconds, formatted in Unix epoch time.
